channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1543; 10:45PM; 208 N Dillon St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3C7gvTz; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: 38 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 mins with no injuries reported. The occupants of the exposed apartment building were safely evacuated. Cause TBD. No further details.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 CM20 CM22 E20 E211 E235 E35 E6 EM11 RA11 RA6 RA806 T11 T35; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1543; 10:25PM; 208 N Dillon St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3C7gvTz; Westlake; One story, single family dwelling (vacant) well involved in fire. This is a defensive operation with one additional task force requested. There is at least one building exposed.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E20 E211 E235 E35 E6 RA6 RA806 T11 T35; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1451; 09:40PM; 8861 N Langdon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qsohos; North Hills; Revised size-up reports multiple autos within a detached carport and there are NO exposed buildings. The first task force will handle, all others being released. No further details.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E290 E7 E90 RA7 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1451; 09:21PM; 8861 N Langdon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qsohos; North Hills; Originally reported as an auto fire, the first engine on scene reported multiple auto fires in a carport exposing a four story apartment building. The incident was upgraded to a structure fire and additional resources are enroute. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E290 E7 E90 RA7 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1249; 07:11PM; 1727 E 106th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IQpnRi; Watts; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes with no injuries reported. The building is L-shaped with the sanctuary on one side and two story office buildings on the other side. The fire was centered in the sanctuary and extended up into the balcony. The primary and secondary searches were clear. Cause TBD. No further details. ; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E21 E233 E264 E64 E65 EM13 RA264 RA65 RA865 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1249; 06:51PM; 1727 E 106th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IQpnRi; Watts; Two story church, previous burn, with fire on the 2nd floor and attic. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E21 E233 E264 E64 E65 EM13 RA264 RA65 RA865 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1185; 04:21PM; 22250 W Strathern St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IVDUee; Canoga Park; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters extinguished the fire in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters encountered excessive storage conditions inside the structure which created challenges reaching the seat of the fire. The fire was mostly towards the rear of the home and extended into the attic. Both occupants were out of the home prior to LAFD arrival and have no medical complaints. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E104 E105 E106 E296 E305 E72 RA72 RA872 T105 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1185; 03:57PM; 22250 W Strathern St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IVDUee; Canoga Park; One story, single family dwelling with heavy smoke showing. One additional task force requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E104 E105 E106 E296 E305 E72 RA72 RA872 T105 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#1053; 03:17PM; 100 N Alvarado St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qgHWHE; Westlake; Three car collision with a total of five patients (no entrapment). One patient fled the scene, one patient declined LAFD transport, three patients (two adults, one child) transported in critical condition (further details per patient not available). The 9-1-1 call was received at 2:44PM. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Rampart Division Inc# 2656; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E20 E220 E3 EM11 RA20 RA209 RA26 RA3 RA811 T20; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Hiker Rescue - FATALITY; INC#0354; 08:59AM; 2698 N Commonwealth Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MJ6YqF; Griffith Park; Update: The hiking trail at Vista Del Valle Dr will be closed to the public while LAPD conducts their (per protocol) investigation (unknown duration but likely several hours). The initial reports of the patient being on a bicycle and revised to reflect he appears to have been on foot - there was no bike by him. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 1140 ; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC5 E235 E35 E90 EM11 H3 H7 HA3 HA7 RA35 RA835 RH114 T35; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart
